paper_title.en: An Object Grasp Comparison of Multi Degrees of Freedom Robot Fingers

description.en: For an object grasp comparison of multi degrees of freedom robot fingers, three types of object grasp mechanism are considered here. Namely they are the conventional finger type mechanism, the wire driven mechanism, and the string winding tentacle type mechanism.

publication_name.en: 2016 INTERNATIONAL SYMPOSIUM ON MICRO-NANOMECHATRONICS AND HUMAN SCIENCE (MHS)

paper_title.en: Experimental Study on Optimal Fusion of Translation Motion and Attitude Control for Multi-legged Robot with Redundant Joint

description.en: In this paper, a multi-legged prototype robot with redundant joint is conducted. To control any motion for the robot with redundant joint, the authors propose an optimal control system with fusing the attitude and the translation motion for multi-legged robot. The proposing optimal method can be adopted in case of number of control input variable being different from number of control output variable. Then to verify the proposing optimal method, the robot having two legs with 4 redundant DOF is treated and three case experiments of optimal fusion for attitude and translation are executed. Then obtained the result is evaluated.

publication_name.en: 2016 INTERNATIONAL SYMPOSIUM ON MICRO-NANOMECHATRONICS AND HUMAN SCIENCE (MHS)

paper_title.ja: 222 マスタ・スレーブ型二足歩行ロボットの研究 : 路面状況呈示装置の力学モデル(ロボティクスI)
paper_title.en: 222 A Study on the Master-Slave Biped Walking Robot : Statics Models of Terrain Simulating Platform

description.ja: A mechanism of a terrain simulating platform in the master-slave biped walking robot system is proposed, which displays the terrain condition of the footholds of the robot. The mechanism is composed of the xy sliding mechanism and the parallel links mechanism, where the xy sliding mechanism locates the base plate to any xy horizontal position while the parallel links mechanism locates the foot plate to any z position and orientation. The inverse kinematics models and the statics models of the two parts are derived.
description.en: A mechanism of a terrain simulating platform in the master-slave biped walking robot system is proposed, which displays the terrain condition of the footholds of the robot. The mechanism is composed of the xy sliding mechanism and the parallel links mechanism, where the xy sliding mechanism locates the base plate to any xy horizontal position while the parallel links mechanism locates the foot plate to any z position and orientation. The inverse kinematics models and the statics models of the two parts are derived.

paper_title.ja: 221 路面状況呈示装置におけるエアシリンダ部の制御(ロボティクスI)
paper_title.en: 221 Control of Air Cylinders on Terrain Simulating Platform

description.ja: A terrain simulating platform which is used in the master-slave system of a biped walking robot is proposed to convey the reaction force of the ground from the robot to the operator soles. This platform is composed of two xy sliding mechanisms and two parallel link mechanisms which use air cylinders. A control system of air cylinders is considered here which feeds back state variables obtained by strain gauges and potentiometers mounted on the cylinders to the Microcontroller Unit.
description.en: A terrain simulating platform which is used in the master-slave system of a biped walking robot is proposed to convey the reaction force of the ground from the robot to the operator soles. This platform is composed of two xy sliding mechanisms and two parallel link mechanisms which use air cylinders. A control system of air cylinders is considered here which feeds back state variables obtained by strain gauges and potentiometers mounted on the cylinders to the Microcontroller Unit.
